price: 61. Мре soki otuni bango: Nani akela likolo na mabele, mpe ati moyi na sanza, bakolobaka: Allah. Boye boni lisusu (sima) bazali koboya (kolanda nzela ya semba)?
arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَسَخَّرَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ وَٱلۡقَمَرَ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُۖ فَأَنَّىٰ يُؤۡفَكُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa wasakhara al-shamsa wal-qamara layaqūlunna al-lahu fa-annā yu'fakūna
